�Apewing�     �Speed Viper�      �Electronet�


   "Hey, why don't we stop firing who our Commander fires on and fire on 
other enemys."  Apewing says to the other two Fuzors.

   "Speed Viper understand."  Speed Viper says as he fires 8 semi-automatic 
bullets at Deemos.

   "Die Dishwasher!"  Electronet yells at Train wreck as he fires 4 electric 
blast and 4 optics at him.

   Apewing fires 1 missle at Train wreck and 1 missle at Aerotaur.

   Speed Viper then decides to run after Hot Rod.  He uses his tremendous 
speed to try to gaim ground on the fleeing Hot Rod.  He fired 25 Rapid fire 
lasers at Train wreck as he ran by.
